title: Butler Brothers
content:
[http://www.fodastudio.com/images/bbc\_brand\_large.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fodastudio.com/images/bbc_brand_large.gif "http://www.fodastudio.com/images/bbc\_brand\_large.gif")

Could someone help me with this one?

 [‹ Encyclopaedia of Ireland Cover font, LTC Californian](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33919 "Go to previous forum topic") [Unusual Sans (to me at least!) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33927 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wolfattack

comments.content:
Not sure, but there are two fonts or lettering styles here.

Alternates:  
 [Refrigerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mark_simonson/refrigerator_bold/&sample_text=BROTHERS&sample_size=96)  
 [Kaliber](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/kaliber_bold/&sample_text=BROTHERS&sample_size=96)  
 [FF Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_gothic/&sample_text=BROTHERS&sample_size=74)  
 [Diamante](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/diamante_bold/&sample_text=BROTHERS&sample_size=74)  
 [Agency](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/agency_bold/&sample_text=BROTHERS&sample_size=96)  
 [Mekanik](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/mekanik/&sample_text=BROTHERS&sample_size=144)
Thanks again for the help Stephen.

[Liquorstore](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.chank.com/font_detail.php?sku=5123) for Brothers and then I guees that [Nicotine](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154341/http:/www.chank.com/font_detail.php?sku=5029) for Butler.
